src:
Market Pulse on November 1st
04 Nov 2019, 08:08 by Olivier Rigot, EMC Gestion de Fortune

S&P 500 3066,91 (+29,35).

Now that the S&P 500 has decisevely broken the resistance at 3020-3040, confirmed by internal momentum, the last opportunity to buy may materialize if prices come back to the breakout point, according to the theory. Short term, the market enters into the overbought zone, as measured by our various indicators.




Next update 11th november 2019.


Articles Associés
